room_title: Escape room "The Abandoned Mine" by Epic Escape Game in Grand Junction
room_description:
You are a lead journalist for the Epic Tribune, you always know the latest scoop. Recently, your sources have revealed to you of someone coming and going from the old Groves mine, that’s supposed to be abandoned; so, you’ve gathered your team of investigative journalists and have entered down into the mine to figure out what activity might be going on.
Once inside, the door slammed shut and locked behind you. You get the sudden sensation that something is very wrong. The further into the mine you go, you hear an alarm sound which means, someone is coming! Discover the truth and escape the mine before you’re found out & locked beneath the earth.
